maml:description.maml:para: Add a file to a Gist Object.
Add a file to an existing Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist Object to add a file to.
The path to the file to add to the Gist Object.
The Id of the Gist Object to add a file to.
Use the content of the currently active PowerShell_ISE Tab.
The name of the file to be added to the Gist.
The Id of the Gist Object to add a file to.
The path to the file to add to the Gist Object.
Use the content of the currently active PowerShell_ISE Tab.
The name of the file to be added to the Gist.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

maml:alert.maml:para: The IseScriptPane and FileName parameters are only avaiable from within the PowerShell ISE.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Add-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Path .\HelloWorld.ps1
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will add a new file to the Gist Object, named 'HelloWorld.ps1' with the contents of the file.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Add-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -IseScriptPane
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will use the content from within the active ISE Script Pane as a new file for the Gist Object.

maml:description.maml:para: Copy (Fork) a Gist Object.
Copy (Fork) a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist Object to copy (fork).
The Id of the Gist Object to copy (fork).
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

maml:alert.maml:para: The currently authenticated user context cannot copy (fork) their own Gist Object(s).

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Copy-Gist -Id abcde12345
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a new Gist Object under the currently authenticated user context, using the lastest revision from another users Gist Object.

maml:description.maml:para: Get a Gist Object.
Get a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
Returns the Gist Objects of a specified user.
Returns a specific Gist Object.
Returns either Starred or Public Gist Objects.
Returns the Gist Objects of a specified user.
Returns a specific Gist Object.
Returns either Starred or Public Gist Objects.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

maml:alert.maml:para: Only Starred and Public Gist Objects of the currently authenticated user context can be returned when using the Target parameter.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-Gist -Owner dotps1 | Select-Object -First 1
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns all the Gist Objects owned by dotps1. (Selects the first one for example output simplicitiy.)

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-Gist -Target Starred | Select-Object -First 1
Owner : dotps1 Description : Find users in a domain that have the protected attribute that should not, remove that attribute and re enable inheritance. Id : a5b60bdf7955e029a500 CreatedAt : 2/3/2016 3:20:37 PM UpdatedAt : 2/4/2016 11:59:19 AM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/a5b60bdf7955e029a500

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns a list of all the current authenticated users context starred Gist Objects. (Selects the first one for example output simplicitiy.)

maml:description.maml:para: Get GistCommit Objects of a Gist Object.
Get-GistCommit Objects of a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist Object to get commits from.
The Id of the Gist Object to get commits from.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-GistCommit -id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1
User : dotps1 Version : 7027070018888418de9d05e867ed4fea249c974d CommittedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Additions : 21 Deletions : 0

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the list of Commits made to a Gist Object.

maml:description.maml:para: Get Fork Objects of a Gist Object.
Get Fork Objects of a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist Object to return Fork Objects from.
The Id of the Gist Object to return Fork Objects from.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-GistFork -Id c2d51c498f99dae2bb73
User : Tiberriver256 Id : e3d1cb9ce70d8450776bc00e735b369a CreatedAt : 4/19/2016 9:33:07 AM UpdatedAt : 4/19/2016 9:33:08 AM Url : https://api.github.com/gists/e3d1cb9ce70d8450776bc00e735b369a

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the Forked Gist from supplied Gist ID.

maml:description.maml:para: Get a Version of a Gist Object.
Get a Version of a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-GistVersion -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Version 7027070018888418de9d05e867ed4fea249c974d
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns a specific version of gist. The Version value is returned from Get-GistCommit.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-Gist | Select-Object -First 1 | Get-GistCommit | Select-Object -Last 1 | Get-GistVersion
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the first commit of a Gist Object.

maml:description.maml:para: New Gist Object.
New Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The path to the file to add to the Gist Object.
The Description value of the Gist.
Specifies if the Gist should be publicly visalbe.
The Description value of the Gist.
Specifies if the Gist should be publicly visalbe.
Use the content of the currently active PowerShell_ISE Tab.
The name of the file to be added to the Gist.
The Description value of the Gist.
Specifies if the Gist should be publicly visalbe.
The path to the file to add to the Gist Object.
Use the content of the currently active PowerShell_ISE Tab.
The name of the file to be added to the Gist.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

maml:alert.maml:para: The IseScriptPane and FileName parameters are only avaiable from within the PowerShell ISE.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Add-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Path .\HelloWorld.ps1 -Public
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will create a new Gist using the file 'HelloWorld.ps1'.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
New-Gist -IseScriptPane -Public
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will create a new Gist using the currently active script tab from the PowerShell_Ise. The file will be named the tab title.

maml:description.maml:para: New GitHub OAuth Token.
New GitHub OAuth Token using the supplied credentials giving API access to Gist Objects.
Username and Password to authenticate to GitHub.
A description of the token being created.
Username and Password to authenticate to GitHub.
A description of the token being created.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.

maml:alert.maml:para: This function is called at anytime the Invoke-GistApi (Private function) is called and the $env:GIST_OAUTH_TOKEN is $null.
The token generated only gives rights to use and modify Gist objects, it cannot be used to manipulate GitHub Repositories.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
New-GistOAuthToken
OAuth Token Value: 00000000000000000000000000000000

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-Credential | New-GistOAuthToken -Descrition 'My Gist OAuth Token'
OAuth Token Value: 00000000000000000000000000000000

maml:description.maml:para: Remove Gist Object.
Remove Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist Object to delete.
The Id of the Gist Object to delete.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
Specifies a return value type for a method that does not return a value.

maml:alert.maml:para: This will completely remove the Gist including its commits, revisions, comments, and files. It will not remove Forks that other users have made from this Gist Object.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Remove-Gist -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Remove-Gist -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Confirm:$false

dev:remarks.maml:para: Use the -Confirm Parameter to bypass warning prompts.

maml:description.maml:para: Remove Gist File from a Gist Object.
Remove Gist File from a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
Id of the Gist Object containing the file to remove.
The FileName to be removed.
Id of the Gist Object containing the file to remove.
The FileName to be removed.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
Specifies a return value type for a method that does not return a value.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Remove-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -FileName HelloWorld.ps1

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Remove-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -FileName HelloWorld.ps1 -Confirm:$false

dev:remarks.maml:para: Use the -Confirm Parameter to bypass warning prompts.

maml:description.maml:para: Rename Gist File from a Gist Object.
Rename Gist File from a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist containing the file to be renamed.
The Current Name of the file.
The Name to be appiled to the file.
The Id of the Gist containing the file to be renamed.
The Current Name of the file.
The Name to be appiled to the file.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Rename-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -OldName HelloWorld.ps1 -NewName HelloWorld1.ps1
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

maml:description.maml:para: Save Gist Object.
Save Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
Path to save the Gist and its file(s).
The Id of the Gist to be saved.
Path to save the Gist and its file(s).
The Id of the Gist to be saved.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
Provides properties and instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of FileStream objects. This class cannot be inherited.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Save-Gist -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1
Directory: C:\Users\tmalkewitz\AppData\Roaming\PSGist\fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1
Mode LastWriteTime Length Name ---- ------------- ------ ---- -a---- 4/19/2016 12:44 PM 337 PSGist.psm1

dev:remarks.maml:para: Save the Gist file to local computer.

maml:description.maml:para: Set Gist Object.
Set Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
The Id of the Gist Object to modify.
The Description to be applied top the Gist Object.
The Id of the Gist Object to modify.
Marks a Gist Object as 'Starred'.
The Id of the Gist Object to modify.
The Description to be applied top the Gist Object.
Marks a Gist Object as 'Starred'.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
Specifies a return value type for a method that does not return a value.

maml:alert.maml:para: At this time a Gist Object cannot be both Starred/UnStarred and have the Description updated at the same time.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Set-Gist -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Star $true

dev:remarks.maml:para: Marks the Gist Object as Starred by the currently authenticated user.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Set-Gist -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Description 'Hello World Gist.'

dev:remarks.maml:para: Sets the description of the Gist Object to 'Hello World Gist.'.

maml:description.maml:para: Set Gist OAuth Token.
Set Gist OAuth Token value for authenticating to the GitHub API to access Gist Objects.
The Value to set $env:GIST_OAUTH_TOKEN.
The Value to set $env:GIST_OAUTH_TOKEN.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.

dev:type.maml:name: System.String
dev:type.maml:uri: Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.

maml:description.maml:para: Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.

maml:alert.maml:para: After you create a GitHub Personal Access Token, if the value is not recorded, the value cannot be retrevied.
If the Token Parameter is not used, this cmdlet will simply call the New-GistOAuthToken cmdlet.

maml:description.maml:para: Update Gist File in a Gist Object
Update Gist File in a Gist Object using the currently authenticated user context.
Id of the Gist Object to update a File from.
The path to the file to be updated in the Gist Object.
Id of the Gist Object to update a File from.
Use the content of the currently active PowerShell_ISE Tab.
The FileName of the item to be updated.
Id of the Gist Object to update a File from.
The path to the file to be updated in the Gist Object.
The FileName of the item to be updated.
Use the content of the currently active PowerShell_ISE Tab.
Represents text as a sequence of UTF-16 code units.
A .net representation for the JSON Object returned from the GitHub API.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Update-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -Path .\HelloWorld.ps1
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will add a new file to the Gist Object, named 'HelloWorld.ps1' with the contents of the file.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Update-GistFile -Id fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 -IseScriptPane
Owner : dotps1 Description : Demo Gist for PSGist PowerShell Module. Id : fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1 CreatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM UpdatedAt : 4/18/2016 3:12:16 PM Public : True HtmlUrl : https://gist.github.com/fbaba8119507ce58739ca356349cedb1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will use the content from within the active ISE Script Pane as a new file for the Gist Object.
